source:
df = spark.sql("""
    SELECT 
        SU.id
        ,SU.salutation
        ,SU.firstName
        ,SU.lastName
        ,SU.addressLine1
        ,SU.addressLine2
        ,SU.addressTown
        ,SU.addressCounty
        ,SU.postcode
        ,SU.addressCountry
        ,SU.organisation
        ,SU.organisationType
        ,SU.role
        ,SU.telephoneNumber
        ,SU.otherPhoneNumber
        ,SU.faxNumber
        ,SU.emailAddress
        ,SU.webAddress
        ,SU.serviceUserType
        ,SU.caseReference
        ,SU.sourceSystem
        ,SU.sourceSuid
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user SU

    INNER JOIN (

        SELECT id, MAX(IngestionDate) AS latest_date
        FROM odw_harmonised_db.service_user
        WHERE LOWER(sourceSystem) = 'horizon'
        GROUP BY id
        
    ) latest ON SU.id = latest.id AND SU.IngestionDate = latest.latest_date   

    WHERE LOWER(SU.ODTSourceSystem) = 'horizon'
    AND SU.serviceUserType IN ('Applicant', 'RepresentationContact', 'Agent');
""")

df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("odw_curated_migration_db.nsip_service_user")
